title: "[Feature]: "

---

## Problem to solve
What user/problem gap are we addressing?

## Proposed solution
Describe the desired behavior or change.

## Alternatives considered
List alternatives or why current behavior is insufficient.

## Scope and constraints
Any constraints, dependencies, or non-goals.

## QA / validation notes
Reference relevant checklist docs/sections in `docs/qa/` if this request introduces UI/behavior that should be covered.

## Success criteria
How will we know this request is done?
